archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.3.5f: f) considering threat events in the context of the cyber attack chain (i.e. a sequence of threat events used by an adversarial threat when performing an attack).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
